articles.title: NASA Taps Axiom Space for First Artemis Moonwalking Spacesuits - Pragativadi
articles.description: NASA has selected Axiom Space to deliver a moonwalking system for the Artemis III mission, which will land Americans on the surface of the Moon for the first time in over 50 years. This award – the first one under a competitive spacesuits contract –

articles.title: Spielberg off to Toronto as film festival hails LGBTQ 'breakthrough year' - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: Steven Spielberg will lead a host of Hollywood A-listers across the border to Toronto this week for North America's biggest film festival, which organizers say will celebrate a breakthrough year for LGBTQ cinema.
